attributes.action: Make pet insurance companies abide by transparent categories across the board
attributes.additional_details:
Failed claims can:

Cause people to get into debt

Endangers the animals, as people may not have the money to cover the much needed operation or treatment 

Cause animals to be given up/abandoned because their owners can't find the money to care for them

And many people are choosing not to join an insurance company, preferring instead to save the money in a bank - But this could take time to build up 

People have lost faith in the thing designed to protect their pets. 

PLEASE PROTECT OUR PETS
attributes.background:
Currently pet insurance companies can pick and choose which illness/accident they will cover but can word the polices in a way that leaves you believing your pet is covered for anything. 

If there were transparent categories across the board people would know what they were paying for

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
